name: Eleven
info: A Sinner adept at dealing Magic Damage. When an enemy on the field is in [Fear] state, she recovers 1 energy herself. The effect has a 1-second cooldown.
maniaIntensifyText: Damage dealt by summoned creatures increases by 15%.
criminalRecord:
Once a well-known radio host, she ran a program named Call at 3 AM, which was one of the most popular shows in Eastside.

Later, this show and its audience got involved in dozens of disappearance cases and triggered a severe Mania overflow incident, affecting listeners' minds on a large scale and even endangering lives. As a result, it was determined that she needed to be detained immediately.

-- 

After a personal investigation by the Chief, it was determined that the Mania overflow incident happened because she was affected by Mania while under immense mental pressure from others. She had no real intention of harming others and is actively undergoing mental treatment.
mutationAssessment:
+++* Ability Summary
Her special power is generated by her mind, amplified and spread through modern sensors like mobile phones, affecting the minds of the recipients. The impact can range from dizziness and tinnitus to cognitive disorders. In severe cases, it can cause the recipient's internal organs to vibrate and shatter.

+++* Awakening Signs
According to the news, she awakened as a Sinner after a severe mental breakdown due to immense mental pressure. Therefore, her mind is not stable and needs further treatment and analysis.

+++* Corruption State
No obvious signs of corruption are visible on her body, but her mental state is worrisome. Her body clock is extremely disordered, further exacerbating her poor mental state.
ecbFlavourText:
"You can't hear my cries, you can't feel my anger."
"Neither can I."
interrogation2:
Eleven is happy and cooperative in her interrogation, telling the Chief that she has wanted to come to the MBCC for some time now. Having negotiated the cancellation of her program, Eleven wiped the memories of the people who had been pulled into her spiritual realm, and now believes that she destroyed the source of the anomaly. However, the Chief shocks her with the news that after initially disappearing, rumors about Call at 3AM have begun a resurgence. Eleven explains that part of her power had split off from her, and that without it, she couldn't control her abilities. She intentionally drew the Chief to the Eastside TV Station, believing that together, they'd be able to destroy it. Eleven wants to seal the terminal away and is willing to give up her own powers if that means that it can never activate again, but the Chief persuades her to try using it one more time, believing that with the Shackles present, there is no danger and they might be able to learn some clues. Eleven begins to talk with something over the phone, and although she initially argues with it, she quickly begins to succumb to the voice telling her that her failures have all been due to her own weakness. The Chief tries to pull the terminal away from her, but they are pulled back into Eleven's inner world, very similar but much weaker to that which they had escaped from before. A passerby grabs their arm and obsessively instructs them that they have to get to work at the TV tower.

//You brought back the old terminal from the TV station that used Eleven's and your power to call everyone. Eleven admitted that she couldn't control or destroy this part of the lost power. You and Eleven decided to use the terminal to activate the Shackles again in search of useful clues but unexpectedly created another world.//
interrogation3:
When the Chief enters the TV Station, the facial recognition system identifies them as Eleven and allows them access. They realize that the Shackles, combined with Eleven's power, have intertwined fragments of both their consciousnesses together into a single body. In Eleven's old workplace, they find a huge number of people working enthusiastically despite the late hour, and Eleven's boss pulls them in to record her radio show. Eleven instantly settles in to her rhythm, and the Chief observes that she seems to love what she does. Eleven reluctantly agrees, but the show begins and she is forced to focus on her work. The first caller is a nervous young woman whom Eleven is able to genuinely help, but the next call mocks the program and scorns her dedication. At the end of the show, Eleven's producer concocts a scheme for another employee to write scripts where she will pretend to be a bullied girl calling in to ask Eleven for advice. At the same time, she hands Eleven a new phone so that she can be available to be called in for work any time -- the same old terminal which housed the escaped part of her powers, and the Chief realizes that they are experiencing the origin of the ghost who caused the Ghost Calls incidents. As the Chief and Eleven take it, the world around them begins to crumble, and Eleven despairs that nothing has changed since the time when the ghost lived.

//In the end, you discover that this world belongs to a part of the old terminal, coming from the Ghost in Ghost Call that has been troubling Eleven. She, just like Eleven, was a host. However, the good feelings she used to bring to others with her honesty and cheering personality were eventually turned into templates and lifeless performances aimed at getting views and earning profits.//
arrestRec1: After resolving the massive impact caused by the Mania overflow, she disappeared. However, investigations found that she might have resolved the root cause of the overflow incident. In the end, she voluntarily went to the Bureau and asked the Chief for detention.
arrestRec2: The remnants of her Mania ability have once again generated a space distorted by the Mania power. After an interrogation with her, it is known that she has repeatedly investigated this Mania power and attempted to destroy it, but to no significant effect.
arrestRec3: She and the Chief investigated the twisted space and found the truth about the original Call at 3 AM urban legend and her connection to it. With the efforts of her and the Chief, the urban legend was resolved, and the twisted space returned to normal.
arrestRec4: At her request, the Eastside TV station's program Call at 3 AM will be permanently canceled, and Eleven will be removed from the TV station. However, the TV station allowed her to record a final farewell program. The farewell program was a departure from her usual style, with witty and aggressive commentary. As a result, it once again became a top search keyword and spawned a completely different late-night radio program specifically for the new her.
servingTerm1: As a former late-night radio host, she initially had trouble adjusting to the Bureau's schedule, often staying awake at night. Given the nature of her unique voice, strange tales regarding "voices" soon started spreading around the Bureau.
servingTerm2: She keeps a collection of peculiar items in her room, such as candy wrappers, Martian sand, and "slimes." Investigations revealed that these were all tools for her ASMR recording sessions.
servingTerm3: Most people in the Bureau enjoy engaging in heart-to-heart conversations with her. She even knows Hella's bank account balance and where Bai Yi's secret stash of alcohol is. Many also confide their negative feelings to her, and she rarely disappoints them. Through witty and incisive conversations, she helps them vent their frustrations.
servingTerm4: She has an inexplicable obsession with Chief's working hours. If Chief works beyond the usual time, she will provide gentle reminders. However, most of the time, her reminders are of little use, and Chief often receives a call from her at 3 AM.
emotionCheck1:
[Eleven's dark circles under her eyes have become increasingly noticeable.]

**Eleven:** Woken up again by the announcement for outdoor activity time...

**Chief:** ......

* **Prompt:** How about changing the program to daytime?
 * **Eleven:** But my heart is with those who need someone to confide in at night...
 * **Eleven:** ğŸ˜¥

* **Prompt:** Try wearing earplugs while you sleep?
 * **Eleven:** I heard that the earplugs Miss [[[list of minor characters |Faye]]] purchased can "block out all noises," yet the radio is capable of "penetrating anything"... Heh, that sounds like a slogan my program sponsor would come up with.
 * **Eleven:** ğŸ˜‰
emotionCheck2:
[Eleven is organizing the tools used for ASMR recording.]

**Eleven:** Which one should I record? The scratching sound of claws on the pavement trees, or the rustling noise of antennae brushing against the eardrum?

**Chief:** ......

* **Prompt:** Neither one really seems like an option for ASMR.
 * **Eleven:** Don't say that. Besides my little poems, these are the two most popular options for ASMR radio, perfect for sleepless nights... You should give it a try.
 * **Eleven:** ğŸ˜˜

* **Prompt:** Both sound pretty hypnotizing, both are good.
 * **Eleven:** If you're interested, I can send you a copy of a draft. Try falling asleep while listening to it. It's sure to help you drift off into dreamland.
 * **Eleven:** ğŸ˜‰
supervision1:
++* âš  Alone Time

//Eleven voluntarily requests to be sent to the Confinement Cell.//

**System Notifications:** Eleven is one of the few people who voluntarily asks to stay in the Confinement Cell for hours. She always appears exceptionally refreshed after coming out.

* **Prompt:** Let her be, she just wants some alone time.
supervision2:
++* âš  Low-End Recording Studio

//Eleven has been spending most of her time holed up in the secret room lately.//

**System Notifications:** The Supervision System has detected that Eleven often enters the secret room alone and stays there for several hours. When you go to check, you find that she is just recording ASMR there.

* **Prompt:** It seems like you need a dedicated recording studio.
supervision3:
++* âš âš  Inspiration Hunt

//The usage rate of the secret room has surged recently.//

**System Notifications:** The Supervision System detected that Sinner Eleven frequently enters and stays in the secret room for a long time with unspecified sinners. Please investigate to confirm whether there are any violations.

**Chief:** Let me see... [[[Enfer]]], [[[Bai Yi]]], [[[Etti]]], [[[EMP]]]... Is Eleven really that fond of socializing?

* **Prompt:** Go check the situation

**Eleven:** Thank you, this is all very helpful... This is a little something for you. Please take them.

**Eleven:** Huh, Chief? What a surprise to see you here... What are you doing here?

* **Prompt:** I should be asking that.

**Chief:** What on earth are you doing here?

**System Notifications:** Just as you approach the secret room, you bump into Eleven, who is smiling as she sends another Sinner out the door, giving her a small package of unknown contents.

**Chief:** At first glance, it feels like something illegal is happening.

**Eleven:** I'm just swapping some ASMR sleep aids for some personal experiences or word-of-mouth stories... Is that a violation in MBCC?

**Chief:** Trading for stories?

**Eleven:** Yes. To ensure the quality of my program, I need a constant flow of new material, but the stories on the internet are too messy and hard to verify...

* **Prompt:** So, you chose to interview Sinners?

**Eleven:** That's right. If you're interested in these stories, you can also tune into my program... I'm getting all positive feedbacks from my listeners!

**Chief:** It feels like I'll definitely need some ASMR to fall asleep after listening to it...
supervision4:
++* âš âš  Role Change

//Eleven's hypnosis therapy sessions always take a long time.//

**System Notifications:** Eleven takes too long for hypnotherapy, about 160.7% more than average. Please investigate and appropriately intervene.

* **Prompt:** Go and check the Hypnosis Room

**Chief:** It so happens that she seems to be receiving treatment right now. Better to be early. Go check it out.

**Eleven:** Yes, I understand... it's okay... it's good to talk about it.

**System Notifications:** As soon as you reach the door of the Hypnosis Room, you hear the sound of crying, like she's in the middle of an emotional breakdown, mixed with vague comforting sounds.

**Chief:** What's going on, Eleven? Uh... Doctor. You're the one crying.

**System Notifications:** You're taken aback by what's happening in the Hypnosis Room. Eleven is gently comforting the sobbing hypnotist.

* **Prompt:** Wait, what's going on here?

**Chief:** Aren't you here for hypnosis treatment? Why are you acting like the hypnotist now?

**Eleven:** It might be because my voice makes people want to talk... After a while, the hypnotist couldn't control his emotions.

**System Notifications:** There's a hint of fatigue in Eleven's smile.

**Chief:** If you feel like you need help, you can call me at any time. At MBCC, you shouldn't be forced to be anyone's emotional support.

**Eleven:** Thank you. I feel better already just hearing that.
supervision5:
++* âš âš âš  Bureau Rumors

//A new rumor has suddenly started circulating within the Bureau.//

**System Notifications:** The monthly time for file review is here again. This time, the change in the average number in the "Training Hours" column catches your attention.

**Chief:** The average has dropped by more than 30%... What's going on?

**System Notifications:** Supervision System: According to the data, the number of people in the Bureau mentioning "Training Room" and "ghost" has increased by 180% in the past month, which may be loosely related to this phenomenon.

* **Prompt:** Investigate

**Chief:** That's it. I'm going to investigate the truth behind the "Training Room Ghost" mystery. Miss [[[OwO]]], the mighty and awe-inspiring lion dancer who is good at exorcism, would you like to join me?

**OwO:** You have great taste to recognize my domineering and powerful aura. It can drive away all evil! All right, the great OwO will accompany you to check out this so-called Training Room Ghost!

**System Notifications:** You and OwO arrive at the entrance of the Training Room late at night. Sure enough, you hear strange noises. It's mournful and eerie, coming from the pitch-dark depths of the Training Room.

**OwO:** Why aren't you opening the door? Are you planning to let me do it? I'm not the type to do that!

* **Prompt:** Open the door
 * **Chief:** I'll open it. Get ready.
 * **Eleven:** Give me back my eyes! Give! It! Back!
 * **OwO:** Awooo!!! The ghost story is real!!!
 * **Chief:** ...Eleven, why is it you?
 * **Eleven:** Oh dear, why are you all here? I was just practicing my scary voice, so I can make it even scarier. I even chose a time when there were fewer people around... Did I scare you?
 * **OwO:** I wasn't scared at all! I-I just wanted to test whether my roar is more powerful than your eerie voice!
 * **Eleven:** Are you also interested in voice training? What a cute and diligent girl! Your lion's roar is already very powerful, but if you use my vocal technique, it can definitely become even more intimidating.
 * **Chief:** Stop pranking her, Eleven, she'll really believe it. The Bureau can't handle a second "Midnight Lion's Roar" ghost story.

* **Prompt:** Don't open the door
 * **Chief:** Are you scared, is that why you want me to go in first?
 * **OwO:** W-who said I am scared?! I just wanted to say if I, the Thunderous and Invincible OwO, were to handle this, I'd break the door and drive out the evil ghosts at the same time!
 * **Chief:** In that case, please don't. I don't want to lose a door.
 * **Eleven:** Give me back my eyes! Give! It! Back!
 * **System Notifications:** It may be an illusion, but the eerie sounds coming from the Training Room seem to be getting closer to you. Even OwO can't pretend anymore, taking refuge directly behind you.
 * **Eleven:** I thought I heard people talking outside the door... What are you doing in the Training Room so late?
 * **Chief:** That's my line, Eleven. You're the reason behind the ghost story, practicing your vocal range in the middle of the night...
 * **Eleven:** Hehe, yes... This is a new vocal technique I've learned, it's said to make any voice scarier. Seems I've succeeded.
 * **Chief:** Yes, you certainly have, congratulations... So you can use your normal voice now, right? OwO has already run away in fear, I hope she doesn't get lost in the dark.
supervision6:
++* âš âš âš  Nightlife

//The healthy routines implemented by the Bureau don't seem to be thoroughly enforced.//

**Chief:** This should be the last document I need to process today... Huh? It's past midnight already?

**System Notifications:** After a long overtime shift, you walk alone in the Bureau shrouded by night and sleep. As you pass the secret room, you suddenly hear a gentle female voice leaking from the slightly ajar door.

* **Prompt:** Listen by the door crack

**Chief:** Who could be in the secret room so late? Is it Eleven recording for her program?

**Eleven:** ...That concludes "Syndicate's Best Archerqueen"'s submission. I want to thank this active listener for participating, and thank you all for listening.

**Eleven:** It's well into the night. I wonder how many of my listeners would like to have a midnight snack. Our next submission is about...

**System Notifications:** Perhaps, due to the door being open, Eleven startles when you approach and meets your gaze. After playing a piece of music, she leaves the microphone and comes to the door.

**Eleven:** Chief, what brings you here? You're just in time. I'm doing a special in-house broadcast... It's a rare opportunity, so would you like to say a few words to everyone?

* **Prompt:** Accept
 * **Chief:** Well, I suppose I can't refuse.
 * **Eleven:** You want to, Chief? That's fantastic! After I finish reading this submission, I'll introduce you as our special guest!
 * **System Notifications:** Eleven laughs happily, cuts the music, and picks up the script.
 * **Eleven:** This submission is from "A Pipe that Travels the World", who wishes to share how you can get more desserts from the cafeteria lady after mealtime has ended...
 * **Chief:** Wait, Eleven, can I take a look at these scripts you've finished? I think there might be quite a few clues about rule-breaking behavior in there.
 * **System Notifications:** Eleven professionally reads the script, pushing the documents you need towards you with one elbow. The program continues, with no one aware of what's to come tomorrow.

* **Prompt:** Decline
 * **Chief:** It's a bit sudden, maybe next time.
 * **Eleven:** That's true, if you're here at this time, you must've been working overtime again. Go back and rest.
 * **Chief:** It's not that, I'm just not used to radio programs, so I can't handle it as well as you. Maybe I can participate after I get to know your program a little more.
 * **Eleven:** I'm looking forward to it. The response to this special program has been very good, and there are still many Sinners actively participating. I believe the day when Chief is a guest won't be too far away.
 * **Chief:** You mean... even at this time, there are still Sinners who haven't gone to bed and are listening to your program?
 * **Chief:** No wonder the Supervision System always shows that someone is dawdling after the recess broadcast... They stayed up late.
 * **Eleven:** Hehe, maybe people's nightlife is much more eventful than you think.
 * **Chief:** It's better not to be too eventful.
baseVoicelines:
[Obtain the Sinner]
Hello, wandering souls. Come and pick up this "Call at 3 AM." Wandering around on a lightless night, are you trying to say something to me?

[Raise to Phase 1]
The midnight chime sounded. Come, stay with me...

[Raise to Phase 3]
I will turn everything you give me into a cage that binds you...!

[Level Start]
The phone is ringing, my dear. I'm right behind you...

[Win Battles]
Goodbye, my dear.

[Lose Battles]
The phone keeps ringing non-stop... Gimme a break...

[Ultimate Skill]
Thank you for tuning in.

[Die in Battles]
No... No... Stop talking...

[Greeting]
What story will you share with me today?

[Conversation 1]
If you can't sleep, why not tune in to my broadcast, "Call at 3 AM". I hope it can bring some gentleness into your night.

[Conversation 2]
People always look for something they desire, something that soothe them in me. How sad... Ah, but, I'm looking forward to you being a guest on my show.

[Conversation 3]
I can take all the emotions others flood me with, and grind them with my mind and heart into a smiling voice on the airwaves.

[Special Conversation 1]
Humans are such amazing creatures. After that electrifying moment of locking eyes, you and I no longer look the same for each other.

[Special Conversation 2]
If it weren't for all those rumors and legends, I could read poems or tell a story to the sound of the midnight rain... then greet the first ray of dawn after a rainy night...

[Special Conversation 3]
"Her silhouette slowly approaches you from behind, envelops you, and finally... embraces you...!" Oops, did I startle you? Don't be scared... it's just me...

[Full Compliance]
My views have been overturned, and my world has been changed, but I know... this is not misfortune. Thank you for becoming the fissure in this world to free me from my shackles...

[Idle]
A Little Poem, line 27: "If the world could be changed by dreaming, then I would sleep in this dream and never wake up, until the joyous world of my imagination has been created."

[Annoyed]
You want me to stay with you this much...? Don't worry... I'll call you tonight.

[Special Attention]
Don't be so nervous. I can stay on the line with you. You just continue with what you're doing, and I'll be here with you. If you still feel ill at ease... how about I sing a song for you?

[Dispatch]
Let me see, what's different about your world.

[Dispatch Complete]
This is all that I can give you.

[Level Up]
Come, come closer... a little bit more.

[Pat Head]
Do you want to know how much I've missed you??
nightmareTalent: When an enemy on the field is in [Fear] state, its damage taken is increased by 10%. The effect lasts for the whole battle.

exclusiveCrimebrand.name: Manual Mute
exclusiveCrimebrand.description:
New exclusive Ultimate [Manual Mute].
Eleven swallows any existing [Strange Entities] on the field, then summons a [Strange Entity] at each corner of the target 3x3 square. For each [Strange Entity] swallowed, the [Strange Entities] summoned by this Ultimate gain a 4% / 6% / 8% increase in Magic Damage, lasting 10 / 12.5 / 15 seconds.
[Manual Mute] can only be used once per battle.
exclusiveCrimebrand.flavourText:
"You can't hear my cries, you can't feel my anger."
"Neither can I."

maniaIntensify.title: Leapfrog
maniaIntensify.text: Damage dealt by summoned creatures increases by 15%.

guide.title: Summary
guide.text: Eleven is a Magic DMG Sinner, and the hypercarry of the 3E (Summon) team. She has a 3x3 Ult that fears and deals 1 corebreak to all enemies in range, and summons one [Strange Entity]. This [Strange Entity] or 'hand' is the key behind her damage output.

guide.title: Should you pull for Eleven?
guide.text: Only pull for Eleven if you already have, or plan to pull Eve. Ideally, you should also have Enfer to complete the 3E team, but 2E also works in the current meta. As the Summon team involving Eleven is considered both expensive and difficult to play, she is not a recommended pull unless you are willing to invest the resources and effort.

guide.title: What shackles should I aim for?
guide.text: Eleven can function at S0, but S1 is a damage boost that makes her more comfortable to play. S3 is considered a must for long fights such as ToA.

guide.title: Gameplay Tips
guide.text: As Eleven is a very detailed Sinner and should be played in the context of 3E, please refer to EKG's 3E Summon guide.

pros: Has good burst and sustained damage
Able to benefit from a variety of different buffs
cons: Requires Enfer and Eve to unlock her true potential
High investment because you need to raise 3 S-rank Sinners
EEE team has a high skill floor

crimebrandSets.name: Embrace of the Dead
crimebrandSets.note: Good if you don't have Belltower for BFL. If energy generation isn't a concern in longer stages, you can also bring this. Given that the enemy can be corebroken, this will outdamage the Creation sets.

crimebrandSets.name: Melodious Belltower
crimebrandSets.note: On the summon team (Eleven, Enfer, Eve), she's the one you want that set on. Really effective if you can finish the fight in 30s.

crimebrandSets.name: Servant + City + Creation
crimebrandSets.note: Balanced set that gives some Energy regen, but also damage stats to her and her summons.

crimebrandSets.name: Servant + Inversion
crimebrandSets.note: Constant Energy Generation to Ult more and spawn hands faster for the ECB. Better in longer battles with many fragile mobs or spawn points.

shackles.title: Heartfelt Voice
shackles.description: For every 1 [Strange Entity] present, all [Strange Entities]' Magic Damage +5%.

shackles.title: Harsh Rebuke
shackles.description: Whenever an allied unit inflicts Fear on enemies, the duration of [Strange Entities]' existence +3s. This effect can be triggered up to 1 time per second.

shackles.title: Energy Overflowing
shackles.description: At the start of the battle, Eleven gains 15 energy.

skills.name: Late Night Call
skills.description: Eleven emits electromagnetic waves, dealing (Attack * 67.5%) Magic Damage each time.

skills.name: Frequency Modulation
skills.description: Eleven deals (Attack * 400%) Magic Damage and 1 Core Damage to all enemies within range. [Frequency Modulation] can be charged up to 2 times.

skills.name: FM30.0
skills.description:
[Frequency Modulation] summons an [Strange Entity] in the target grid.

[Strange Entity]: Upon being summoned, it inflicts Fear on all neraby enemies within a 3x3 square for a while. It inherits 100% of Eleven's attack, dealing (Attack * 68.8%) Magic Damage with each normal attack. It cannot block enemies, nor can it be targeted by enemies. It lasts up to 15 seconds. Up to 4 [Strange Entities] can exist at the same time.

skills.name: Melodic Resonance
skills.description: When an allied unit inflicts Fear on enemies, all [Strange Entities] on the field attack all enemies within range, dealing (Attack of [Strange Entity] * 135%) Magic Damage. This effect can be triggered up to 1 time per second.

compliance: Unlocking voice: special conversation 1, Attack +7, Unlock condition: Dispatch Eleven 2 times.
Unlock Voice: Special Conversation 3, Unlock condition: Complete Eleven's Interrogation.
Unlock File: Surveillance records, Unlock Sticker
Unlock File: Surveillance records, Unlock Voice: Full Compliance, Unlock Sinner Title: Airwaves at 3 am.
